ygData.subject: Re: Tripreds and Autobots
ygData.msgSnippet: Pacifix went down to his knees, then transformed, folding up into the motorised part of the military transport vehicle. He backed into the transport part

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Pacifix went down to his knees, then transformed, folding up into the
motorised part of the military transport vehicle. He backed into the
transport part Gesper was in, and conceted himself. He then reved his
engine, and prepared to take off when he was stopped by Gesper. "All
right then."
